posts.post_title: FT/FS: Four common SGC 40 EPDG’s - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Have some more EPDGs available. Prices listed below. Will consider trades for other EPDGs (prefer psa but SGC works too). Too many upgrades to list, so shoot me a PM. Can do cash either way also.

$SOLD Freeman
$SOLD Delehanty
$SOLD Groom
$SOLD Gibson

Thanks for looking!
